[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/groupnews-hydra.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#666666]@Leaders, report new changes each week using the form.[/color]

[b][color=#00FFFF][size=medium]Hypebeast[/size][/color][/b]
[img]https://hackforums.net/images/groupimages/custom/Hypebeast.png[/img]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6065548][b][color=white]HYPE BEAST Membership[/color][/b][/url]
This is a membership into the official Hack Forums group Hype Beast. With this membership, it will give you the first foot through the door of the reselling scene of streetwear. This membership includes a few key instruments that will teach someone who has no experience in sneaker bots the push they need to start. This includes a wide range of things such as copping the latest Yeezys, Supreme jacket, or even Kith product.

[b][color=#C3F36D][size=medium]Ston3rz[/size][/color][/b]
[img]https://hackforums.net/images/groupimages/custom/Ston3rz.gif[/img]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6068639][b][color=white]Ston3rz Membership - Vice Group[/color][/b][/url]
Ston3rz is a group of members who have one thing in common, toking. We are a chill vice group that has daily conversations about the latest strains we smoked, tips and tricks, and overall general discussion about most thing vices.

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6086890][color=#FFFFFF]Hacker Tools[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Omniscient has posted a thread to obtain feedback from the community here at Hack Forums. The hacker tools have been around for a very long time now, but Omniscient is asking everyone for some feedback or even some suggestions on what people would like to see in the hacker tools page. If you have any ideas or anything to say at all about the section make a post on whatever it is so you can help the site.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6087757][color=#FFFFFF]Supreme Court Answers Trump on LGBTQ Discrimination[/color][/url] - [mention=3909991]
Supreme Courts have ruled out that people within the LGBTQ community cant be discriminated against within any workplace. This ruling has been a goal for there community for a while now and it has finally happened. But this is only the first step that the community wants to happen. There are many more to come they hope.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6087811][color=#FFFFFF]USA under massive DDOS attack: All major networks down[/color][/url] - [mention=4623889]
A massive DDOS (distributed denial of service) attack has sent off a mayor phone network known as T-Moblie, the attack has also been targeting sites social media sites and gaming platforms such as Twitch and EPIC Games, but it has taken down T-Moblie and people are not very happy about it. The attack happened on the 15th of June and has now been restored, but the companies are still trying to work out what exactly happened and why.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6087689][color=#FFFFFF]Most Useful Item You Own[/color][/url] - [mention=2386520]
We all own many items, some we wear and some we have just to show-off but sometimes you buy stuff that is so useful you just can't live without the item anymore. Have you ever had or found an item so useful that you can't live without it? Let everyone know what it is.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6086025][color=#FFFFFF]Do you wear a face mask when you go out?[/color][/url] - [mention=777]
Face masks are everywhere at the moment due to the virus COVID-19, Cooligan has made a thread talking about wearing face masks and how it is very important with these times. Cooligan has even shared what they do and when they wear one.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6086271][color=#FFFFFF]Rate My Poem out of 10 [Made for HF][/color][/url] - [mention=1698310]
This thread has shined to us here at the Hack Forums News. A member called frank3nstien has made a very nice poem talking about Hack Forums. If anything we really wanted to bring some attention to the nice poem and would like to say that you did a very good job on the thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6086623][color=#FFFFFF]25$ Giveaway - Multiple Entries Allowed - Single Winner - Post to Enter NOW[/color][/url] - [mention=4686784]
Are you looking to get some easy money for nothing? Then look no more because this giveaway will give you a chance to win $25. The best thing about this giveaway is that you can enter once a day, so you have a chance at boosting your chances of winning.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6087183][color=#FFFFFF]$40 Total BTC giveaway! Three winners ($20/10/10) EASY TO JOIN[/color][/url] - [mention=4052328]
This giveaway is giving three different prizes, and you could be the winner of one of these. The first winner gets $20 and the other two get $10 each. The title even says it's easy to join and it's not just clickbait it's true! Make sure you enter now!
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Tesla Model S 400 Mile Range[/color][/b]
Back in February the Environmental Protection Agency said Elon Musk lied about the Model S range of achieving 400 miles. Musk refuted this statement and accused the test was not properly done. Fast forward to halfway through June and the Model S has officially become the first electric with a 402-mile range. This was achieved by in house of reducing the total weight of the vehicle, “achieved through the standardization of Tesla’s in-house seat manufacturing and lighter-weight materials used in our battery pack and drive units.” All Model S Long Range vehicles will receive this new rating.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/roadshow/news/tesla-model-s-long-range-plus-402-mile-range/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]eBay Executives Charged with Cyber-Stalking[/color][/b]
Some top eBay executives and employees have been fired and charged with cyber-stalking a couple that ran a newsletter against the company. The stalking included sending out live cockroaches to the couple, threatening messages and some bloody costume items from Halloween Prosecutors listed off individuals who have been with the company for a long time, who on multiple occasions sent threatening messages over twitter and visiting the couples house. It goes on to say that the same people order disturbing items and had them delivered to the house of the couple.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/business-53055351] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Spot Is for Sale[/color][/b]
Boston Dynamics, a well-known company for building some of the most advanced Robots in the world has started to sell their first robot dog Spot for $74,500. Spot is currently available for US companies to buy as production is limited and has come to a halt with the COIVD-19 outbreak. The base price is for Spot Explorer kit, “Spot Explorer is designed for developers eager to explore how flexible mobile robots can be adapted for tasks ranging from industrial inspection to entertainment.” Companies can reserve Spot with a $1,000 down payment and expect to ship within six to eight weeks.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/boston-dynamics-robot-dog-spot-finally-goes-on-sale-for-74500/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Re:ZERO TV Anime's 2nd Season Reveals Video, More Cast, July 8 Premiere[/color][/b]
The second season for the anime, "Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-" was initially supposed to air this past spring 2020 anime season. However, due to the COVID-19 epidemic, as you've read a bunch of times, this anime was one of the few that were impacted due to the virus and was put on a temporary delay.

No date was set on when the second season would premiere. Very recently, on the website for the anime, they announced a date in which the show would air. The date the anime will air is on July 8. There is something to note about this, though. The anime is going to be a split-cour anime. A split cour-anime is when a show has half of the show air during one season, and then the other half is not aired during the next season, but the season after that. That might sound confusing, but in Layman's term, it means the first half will be in the summer, and the second half will be in the winter, not the fall. Additionally, we now know there will be more than 20 episodes.

In the first season of the anime, it had 25 episodes. With that being said, if an anime has a sequel, it usually follows the pattern of having the same amount of episodes for its sequel. This is good to know, considering this information was not public yet. However, as mentioned before, it is not too much of a surprise how long the anime is, and it was expected that it would be more than the usual single cour anime, which is 12 or 13 episodes long.

A preview was posted on [url=https://youtu.be/PzOr_5bSdQU]YouTube[/url] showcasing one of the new characters as well as the cast we are familiar with, Subaru and Rem. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-11/re-zero-tv-anime-2nd-season-reveals-video-more-cast-july-8-premiere/.160523]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]P.A. Works' Appare-Ranman! Anime Restarts on July 3 After COVID-19 Delay[/color][/b]
The anime Appare-Ranman will continue airing after taking a short break due to the COVID-19 virus. Originally scheduled to air on May 1, the fourth episode was supposed to air but was put on hold. On July 3, the anime produced by P.A. Works will air from the first episode in Japan, so those who have not seen it or would like a recap can get up to speed. Then, on July 24, the anime will continue where it left off and release a new episode.

The anime takes place at the end of the 19th century. We are met with two characters from Japan who somehow make their way to America (we won't spoil that) where they are introduced to America's modern technology. Appare is an engineer. To him, this technology fascinates him as he looks towards the future rather than being stuck in the past. He is accompanied by Kosame, a samurai who teaches people the art of the sword at a dojo. Unlike Appare, Kosame is afraid of all the futuristic items he's never seen before. Together the two work on projects despite having different personalities and coming up with incredible ideas. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-09/p.a-works-appare-ranman-anime-restarts-on-july-3-after-covid-19-delay/.160410]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]'Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle!' Anime's Episode 11 Delayed by 1 Week[/color][/b]
The website for the "Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle!" anime posted an announcement saying "circumstances with production progress." The eleventh episode was supposed to air on June 14, but instead, the tenth episode will re-air.

The anime takes place in an isekai, also known as an "alternate world" or "alternate universe" in Japanese. It's based on a strategy role-playing mobile application game. The story revolves around a character by the name of Minato, who takes over his father's company after he goes missing. From then on, he and his set of employees have to overcome obstacles of being an adventurer company. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-08/shachibato-president-its-time-for-battle-anime-episode-11-delayed-by-1-week/.160394]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
